tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE leadership_communication_records (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    message TEXT,
    sender VARCHAR(50),
    receiver VARCHAR(50),
    date_sent TIMESTAMP,
    effectiveness_rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE leadership_messages (
    message_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT NOT NULL,
    receiver_id INT NOT NULL,
    message_text TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE message_feedback (
    feedback_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    message_id INT NOT NULL,
    rating INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE leadership_messages (
  message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sender_id INT,
  receiver_id INT,
  message_text TEXT,
  sent_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE message_metrics (
  metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  message_id INT,
  open_rate FLOAT,
  click_through_rate FLOAT,
  conversion_rate FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE leadership_communication (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    message TEXT,
    sender_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    sent_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    received_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE message_feedback (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    message_id INT,
    sender_id INT,
    rating INT,
    feedback TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE communication_channels (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    channel_name VARCHAR,
    channel_type VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE employees (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR,
    department VARCHAR,
    position VARCHAR,
    hire_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE communication_records (
  communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sender_id INT,
  receiver_id INT,
  message TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE sender (
  sender_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sender_name VARCHAR(50),
  department VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE receiver (
  receiver_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  receiver_name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(50),
  role VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE effectiveness_metrics (
  communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  open_rate FLOAT,
  response_rate FLOAT,
  engagement_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE communication_groups (
  group_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  group_name VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT
)
